description: Elasticsearch Vector Store with with advanced, customizable search capabilities.

inputs.name: elasticsearch_url
inputs.info: URL for self-managed Elasticsearch deployments (e.g., http://localhost:9200). Do not use with Elastic Cloud deployments, use Elastic Cloud ID instead.

inputs.name: cloud_id
inputs.info: Use this for Elastic Cloud deployments. Do not use together with 'Elasticsearch URL'.

inputs.name: index_name
inputs.info: The index name where the vectors will be stored in Elasticsearch cluster.

inputs.name: username
inputs.info: Elasticsearch username (e.g., 'elastic'). Required for both local and Elastic Cloud setups unless API keys are used.

inputs.name: password
inputs.info: Elasticsearch password for the specified user. Required for both local and Elastic Cloud setups unless API keys are used.

inputs.name: search_score_threshold
inputs.info: Minimum similarity score threshold for search results.

inputs.name: api_key
inputs.info: API Key for Elastic Cloud authentication. If used, 'username' and 'password' are not required.

inputs.name: verify_certs
inputs.info: Whether to verify SSL certificates when connecting to Elasticsearch.
